urls.description: 23-24 June 2022, Warsaw, Poland The General Data Protection Regulation [1] applies across the European Union since over three years and is part of a modernised EU data protection legislative framework. Despite however the experience that been accumulated over the past years on practical implementation of p rivacy and data protection requirements, there is still a long way to go. This is largely due to the lack of proper integration of these requirements in the ‚Äòheart‚Äô of systems operation ‚Äòby design‚Äô and
